body:
Make a list of who you think are the most valuable player(s) in each Avicus gamemode.

For Example in Walls I would say Poler and Ducks.
body_tagged:
Make a list of who you think are the most valuable player(s) in each Avicus gamemode.

For Example in Walls I would say Poler and Ducks.
title: Who do you think is the MVP of each gamemode?

replies.body:
It depends if you're talking about a public match or a scrim.
If it was a scrim then it wouldn't be some offender, it would more than likely be a person who carried frontlines
replies.body_tagged:
